title: 1.3k RP for a chroma for a 1350 skin
body:
Rito, the hell is this

In order to get enough event tokens to get the chroma for championship ashe, you need to buy the mission pass as well?

So technically speaking, you can spend that 1.3k RP, and still not get the chroma if you get the worst luck for 5 weeks

Seems pretty.... rip offy
